name: 英語教學文法研究
goals: to help students develop a firm grasp of English grammar
to review all aspects of grammar (from word formation to parts of speech and from sentence structures to communicative functions) from the perspective of TESL/TEFL pedagogy
to carry out a mini-practicum of the teaching of English grammar as a part of TESL/TEFL activities
